data.message: Duro's unique moat identified: No competitor combines (1) structured memory types (facts/decisions/episodes/evaluations), (2) decision validation loops, (3) reputation-based autonomy, (4) 48-hour debug gates, (5) confidence decay+reinforcement, (6) local-first full stack. Closest threats: Mem0 ($24M, memory-only), Zep (temporal graphs, cloud-only), Khoj (knowledge retrieval only).
